column1: S086.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S086.DECK.  086. SURVEY NUMBER
S086.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.
S086.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR PRESENT GRADE?  1. SECOND LIEUTENANT 2. FIRST LIEUTENANT 3. CAPTAIN 4. MAJOR 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q2. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN ON ACTIVE SERVICE AS A COMMISSIONED OFFICER IN THE ARMY?  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 6. OVER 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER
S086.Q3A. HAVE YOU SERVED OUTSIDE THE CONTINENTAL UNITED STATES IN THIS WAR?  1. YES, AS AN ENLISTED MAN 2. YES, AS AN OFFICER 3. NO 0. NO ANSWER
S086.Q3B. HAVE YOU BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT IN THIS WAR?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER
S086.Q4. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDAY?  01. 18 YEARS OR YOUNGER 02. 19 03. 20 04. 21 05. 22 06. 23 07. 24 08. 25 09. 26-29 YEARS 10. 30-34 YEARS 11. 35 YEARS OR OVER 00. NO ANSWER

S086.Q5. IN WHAT STATE OF THE UNITED STATES DID YOU SPEND MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY?  01. U.S. (STATE NOT SPECIFIED 02. ALASKA 03. PUERTO RICO 04. FOREIGN 11. MAINE 12. NEW HAMPSHIRE 13. VERMONT 14. MASSACHUSETTS 15. RHODE ISLAND 16. CONNECTICUT 21. NEW YORK 22. NEW JERSEY 23. PENNSYLVANIA 31. OHIO 32. INDIANA 33. ILLINOIS 34. MICHIGAN 35. WISCONSIN 41. MINNESOTA 42. IOWA 43. MISSOURI 44. NORTH DAKOTA 45. SOUTH DAKOTA 46. NEBRASKA 47. KANSAS 51. DELAWARE 52. MARYLAND 53. DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA 54. VIRGINIA 55. WEST VIRGINIA 56. NORTH CAROLINA 57. SOUTH CAROLINA 58. GEORGIA 59. FLORIDA 61. KENTUCKY 62. TENNESSEE 63. ALABAMA 64. MISSISSIPPI 71. ARKANSAS 72. LOUISIANA 73. OKLAHOMA 74. TEXAS 81. MONTANA 82. IDAHO 83. WYOMING 84. COLORADO 85. NEW MEXICO 86. ARIZONA 87. UTAH 88. NEVADA 91. WASHINGTON 92. OREGON 93. CALIFORNIA 00. NO ANSWER

S086.Q6. WHERE WERE YOU LIVING MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY?  1. ON A FARM OR IN THE COUNTRY 2. IN A SMALL TOWN (FEWER THAN 2,500 PEOPLE) 3. IN A TOWN (WITH BETWEEN 2,500 AND 25,000 PEOPLE) 4. IN A CITY (BETWEEN 25,000 AND 100,000 PEOPLE) 5. IN A LARGE CITY (MORE THAN 100,000 PEOPLE) 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q7. HOW MUCH EDUCATION HAVE YOU HAD?  1. LESS THAN 8TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 3. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 4. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 5. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 7. GRADUATE STUDY IN COLLEGE OR UNIVERSITY 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 8 AND 9 TO BE CODED TOGETHER.

S086.Q8. ARE YOU SINGLE, MARRIED, DIVORCED OR SEPARATED, OR WIDOWED? F. IF MARRIED:  Q.9. WERE YOU MARRIED BEFORE OR AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY?  1. SINGLE 2. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 3. WIDOWED 4. MARRIED BEFORE ENTERING THE ARMY 5. MARRIED AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY 6. MARRIED, NO ANSWER AS TO WHEN 0. NO ANSWER
S086.Q10. HOW MANY CHILDREN DO YOU HAVE?  1. I'M NOT MARRIED 2. HAVE NO CHILDREN 3. HAVE ONE CHILD 4. HAVE TWO CHILDREN 5. HAVE THREE OR MORE CHILDREN 0. NO ANSWER
S086.Q11. IS YOUR WIFE NOW EXPECTING A BABY?  1. I'M NOT MARRIED 2. YES 3. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q12. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY ARE YOU IN NOW?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER

S086.Q13. HOW DID YOU RECEIVE YOUR COMMISSION?  1. FROM PILOT-BOMBARDIER-NAVIGATOR TRAINING 2. FROM AIR CORPS TECHNICAL SCHOOL 3. FROM OFFICER CANDIDATE SCHOOL 4. FROM R.O.T.C. OR C.M.T.C. 5. FROM WEST POINT 6. IN SOME OTHER WAY 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q14. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN YOUR PRESENT UNIT (COMPANY, BATTERY, TROOP OR SQUADRON)*  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO ONE YEAR 4. OVER 1 YEAR 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 15 NOT CODED.
S086.Q16. HOW DID YOU COME INTO THE ARMY?  1. I WAS DRAFTED 2. I VOLUNTEERED 3. I WAS IN THE NATIONAL GUARD 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q17. HOW MUCH ACTIVE SERVICE DID YOU SEE AS AN ENLISTED MAN BEFORE YOU RECEIVED YOUR COMMISSION?  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 6. OVER 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q18. WHAT ARM OR SERVICE WERE YOU IN AS AN ENLISTED MAN?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER

S086.Q19. WHAT WAS THE HIGHEST GRADE THAT YOU HELD AS AN ENLISTED MAN BEFORE YOU RECEIVED YOUR COMMISSION AS AN OFFICER?  01. PRIVATE 02. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 03. TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE 04. CORPORAL 05. TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE 06. SERGEANT 07. TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE 08. STAFF SERGEANT 09. TECHNICAL SERGEANT 10. MASTER SERGEANT OR FIRST SERGEANT 11. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER

S086.Q20. IF YOU HAD A CHOICE, WHICH ONE OF THESE BRANCHES OF THE ARMY WOULD YOU LIKE TO BE IN?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 00. NO ANSWER X. DATA FOR THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS NOT PROVIDED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION.
S086.Q36. DO YOU FEEL THAT EVERYTHING POSSIBLE HAS BEEN DONE TO PLACE YOU IN THE ARMY ASSIGNMENT WHERE YOU BEST FIT?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q37. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU, WHAT KIND OF OUTFIT WOULD YOU RATHER BE IN?  1. IN A COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 2. IN A NON-COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 3. IN AN OUTFIT THAT WILL STAY IN THE UNITED STATES 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q38. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU TO CHOOSE, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD DO MORE FOR YOUR COUNTRY AS AN OFFICER IN THE ARMY OR AS A CIVILIAN ENGAGED IN ESSENTIAL WAR WORK?  1. MORE AS A CIVILIAN ENGAGED IN ESSENTIAL WAR WORK 2. MORE AS AN OFFICER IN THE ARMY 3. NO DIFFERENCE 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q39. IF YOU WERE SENT INTO ACTUAL FIGHTING RIGHT NOW, HOW DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD DO?  1. I THINK I WOULD DO ALL RIGHT 2. I THINK I WOULD HAVE TROUBLE AT FIRST, BUT AFTER A WHILE I WOULD BE O.K. 3. I DON'T THINK I WOULD DO VERY WELL 4. I HAVEN'T ANY IDEA HOW I WOULD DO 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q40. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS BEST TELLS THE WAY YOU FEEL ABOUT GETTING INTO THE FIGHTING?  01. I'M READY TO GO AND I WANT TO GET INTO THE REAL FIGHTING SOON 02. I'D LIKE TO GET IN ON THE FIGHTING BEFORE IT'S OVER, BUT I DON'T THINK I'M READY YET 03. I HOPE I WON'T HAVE TO GO, BUT IF I DO, I THINK I'LL DO ALL RIGHT 04. I HOPE I WON'T HAVE TO GO BECAUSE I DON'T THINK I'LL EVER BE GOOD AS A FIGHTER 05. NO INDICATION OF WHETHER HE WANTS TO GO OR NOT 06. WANTS TO GO, BUT DOESN'T WANT TO LEAVE HIS FAMILY 07. WANTS TO FIGHT IF HE CAN GO WITH MEN HE TRAINED 08. WOULD LIKE TO GET IN - BUT IN SOME OTHER BRANCH 09. OTHER COMMENTS INDICATING MAN DOESN'T WISH COMBAT 10. ALL OTHER 00. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 41 NOT CODED.
S086.Q42. HOW MUCH ASSISTANCE IN THE CONDUCT OF YOUR JOB DO YOU RECEIVE FROM YOUR SUPERIOR OFFICERS?  1. TOO MUCH 2. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 3. TOO LITTLE 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q43. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU HAVE SOME GOOD SUGGESTIONS ABOUT HOW THINGS IN YOUR OUTFIT COULD BE DONE BETTER OR EASIER?  1. I HAVE A GOOD MANY SUGGESTIONS 2. I HAVE A FEW SUGGESTIONS 3. I HAVE NO SUGGESTIONS 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q44. IF YOU WERE TO MAKE SUGGESTIONS, HOW DO YOU THINK THEY WOULD BE RECEIVED BY THOSE WHO COULD PUT THEM TO USE?  1. MY SUGGESTIONS WOULD BE GIVEN NO CONSIDERATION WHATEVER 2. MY SUGGESTIONS WOULD BE GIVEN LITTLE CONSIDERATION 3. MY SUGGESTIONS WOULD BE GIVEN CAREFUL CONSIDERATION 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q45. HOW MUCH DOES IT BOTHER YOU WHEN IT IS NECESSARY FOR YOU TO WORK OVERTIME ON YOUR REGULAR DUTIES?  1. BOTHERS ME A GREAT DEAL 2. BOTHERS ME QUITE A BIT 3. DOESN'T BOTHER ME MUCH 4. DOESN'T BOTHER ME AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q46. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOUR SUPERIOR OFFICERS RECOGNIZE YOUR ABILITIES AND WHAT YOU ARE ABLE TO DO?  1. YES, I'M SURE THEY DO 2. YES, I THINK THEY DO BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I DON'T THINK THEY DO 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q47. HOW MUCH DOES IT BOTHER YOU WHEN YOU ARE ORDERED TO DO THINGS WHICH YOU DON'T SEE A GOOD REASON FOR DOING?  1. BOTHERS ME A GREAT DEAL 2. BOTHERS ME QUITE A BIT 3. DOESN'T BOTHER ME MUCH 4. DOESN'T BOTHER ME AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q48. DO TOO MANY OF THE ARMY RULES AND REGULATIONS SEEM USELESS TO YOU?  1. NO, I NEVER THOUGHT SO 2. NO, I USED TO THINK SO, BUT DON'T NOW 3. YES, TOO MANY SEEM USELESS 4. UNDECIDED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S086.Q49. HOW OFTEN ARE YOU IN SITUATIONS WHICH YOU FEEL COULD BE HANDLED MORE EFFECTIVELY BY DOING SOMETHING TECHNICALLY CONTRARY TO REGULATIONS?  1. FREQUENTLY 2. OCCASIONALLY 3. SELDOM 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S086.Q50. HOW OFTEN HAVE YOU DONE SOMETHING TECHNICALLY CONTRARY TO REGULATIONS IN ORDER TO HANDLE A SITUATION MORE EFFECTIVELY?  1. FREQUENTLY 2. OCCASIONALLY 3. SELDOM 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S086.Q51. IN GENERAL, HOW WELL DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS RUN?  1. IT IS RUN VERY WELL 2. IT IS RUN PRETTY WELL 3. IT IS NOT RUN SO WELL 4. IT IS RUN VERY POORLY 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q52. FROM WHAT YOU HAVE SEEN, DO YOU THINK PROMOTIONS USUALLY GO TO THE OFFICERS WHO DESERVE THEM MOST?  1. ALMOST ALWAYS 2. USUALLY 3. ABOUT HALF THE TIME 4. USUALLY NOT 5. ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q53. HOW MANY OF YOUR SUPERIOR OFFICERS USE THEIR RANK IN WAYS THAT SEEM UNNECESSARY TO YOU?  1. ALMOST ALL OF THEM DO 2. MOST OF THEM DO 3. SOME OF THEM DO 4. ONLY A FEW OF THEM DO 5. NONE OF THEM DO 0. NO ANSWER
S086.Q54. DO YOU THINK THAT THE EFFICIENCY RATINGS GIVEN TO OFFICERS ARE USUALLY FAIR OR NOT?  1. USUALLY FAIR 2. USUALLY NOT FAIR 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 55 NOT CODED.

S086.Q56. ABOUT HOW MUCH LONGER FROM NOW DO YOU GUESS THE WAR WILL LAST WITH GERMANY?  01. LESS THAN 6 MONTHS 02. SIX MONTHS UP TO AND INCLUDING 1 YEAR 03. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 1 1/2 YEARS 04. ONE YEAR, SIX MONTHS UP TO AND INCLUDING 2 YEARS 05. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO AND INCLUDING 3 YEARS 06. OVER 3 YEARS 07. INDEFINITE ANSWER INDICATING SHORT TIME 08. INDEFINITE ANSWER INDICATING LONG TIME 09. INDEFINITE ANSWER WITH NO INDICATION OF TIME 10. DON'T KNOW 00. NO ANSWER

S086.Q57. ABOUT HOW MUCH LONGER FROM NOW DO YOU GUESS THE WAR WILL LAST WITH JAPAN?  01. LESS THAN 6 MONTHS 02. SIX MONTHS UP TO AND INCLUDING 1 YEAR 03. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 1 1/2 YEARS 04. ONE YEAR, SIX MONTHS UP TO AND INCLUDING 2 YEARS 05. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO AND INCLUDING 3 YEARS 06. OVER 3 YEARS 07. INDEFINITE ANSWER INDICATING SHORT TIME 08. INDEFINITE ANSWER INDICATING LONG TIME 09. INDEFINITE ANSWER WITH NO INDICATION OF TIME 10. DON'T KNOW 00. NO ANSWER
S086.Q58A. "AFTER THE WAR THE UNITED STATES SHOULD CONTROL AND DOMINATE THE WORLD."  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S086.Q58B. "AFTER THE WAR THE UNITED STATES SHOULD STAY OUT OF WORLD AFFAIRS AND STICK TO THE PROBLEMS WE HAVE IN THIS COUNTRY."  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S086.Q58C. "AFTER THE WAR THE NATIONS OF THE WORLD SHOULD SET UP A STRONG INTERNATIONAL ORGANIZATION."  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q58D. "AFTER THE WAR THE UNITED STATES SHOULD JOIN A STRONG INTERNATIONAL ORGANIZATION OF NATIONS EVEN IF IT MEANT THAT THIS ORGANIZATION WOULD HAVE SOME CONTROL OVER HOW THE UNITED STATES DEALS WITH OTHER COUNTRIES."  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S086.Q58E. "AFTER THE WAR THERE SHOULD BE AN INTERNATIONALLY CONTROLLED ARMY TO POLICE THE WORLD."  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q59. WHICH DO YOU THINK WOULD BE THE BEST WAY FOR THE UNITED STATES TO KEEP OUT OF WAR IN THE FUTURE?  1. STAY OUT OF WORLD AFFAIRS 2. JOIN A STRONG ORGANIZATION OF NATIONS 3. SOME OTHER WAY 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER P. THE NEXT FEW QUESTIONS ASK ABOUT WHAT ENLISTED MEN ARE THINKING. OF COURSE YOU CAN'T ALWAYS BE CERTAIN BUT DO YOUR BEST TO ANSWER THESE QUESTIONS FROM YOUR OWN EXPERIENCE AND CONTACTS WITH ENLISTED MEN.

S086.Q60. IN YOUR OPINION, HOW MANY OF THE ENLISTED MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT ARE SATISFIED WITH THEIR PRESENT ARMY JOBS?  1. ALMOST NONE OF THEM 2. ABOUT ONE-FOURTH OF THEM 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM 4. ABOUT THREE-FOURTHS OF THEM 5. ALMOST ALL OF THEM 6. HAVEN'T ANY IDEA 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q61. HOW MANY OF THE ENLISTED MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT WOULD YOU SAY FEEL VERY PROUD OF THEIR COMPANY (BATTERY, SQUADRON, TROOP)*  1. ALMOST NONE OF THEM 2. ABOUT ONE-FOURTH OF THEM 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM 4. ABOUT THREE-FOURTHS OF THEM 5. ALMOST ALL OF THEM 6. HAVEN'T ANY IDEA 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q62. IN YOUR OPINION, HOW MANY OF THE ENLISTED MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT FEEL THAT THEY CAN DO MORE FOR THEIR COUNTRY AS SOLDIERS THAN THEY COULD DO AS WORKERS IN WAR JOBS?  1. ALMOST NONE OF THEM 2. ABOUT ONE-FOURTH OF THEM 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM 4. ABOUT THREE-FOURTHS OF THEM 5. ALMOST ALL OF THEM 6. HAVEN'T ANY IDEA 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q63. HOW MANY OF THE ENLISTED MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT DO YOU THINK FEEL SURE THAT THEIR OFFICERS RECOGNIZE THEIR ABILITIES AND WHAT THEY ARE ABLE TO DO?  1. ALMOST NONE OF THEM 2. ABOUT ONE-FOURTH OF THEM 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM 4. ABOUT THREE-FOURTHS OF THEM 5. ALMOST ALL OF THEM 6. HAVEN'T ANY IDEA 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q64. IN YOUR OPINION, HOW MANY OF THE ENLISTED MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT FEEL THAT THEIR ARM OR SERVICE HAS THE MOST IMPORTANT JOB IN WINNING THE WAR?  1. ALMOST NONE OF THEM 2. ABOUT ONE-FOURTH OF THEM 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM 4. ABOUT THREE-FOURTHS OF THEM 5. ALMOST ALL OF THEM 6. HAVEN'T ANY IDEA 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q65. HOW MANY OF THE ENLISTED MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT WOULD YOU SAY THINK THE UNITED STATES WILL BE A BETTER PLACE TO LIVE IN AFTER THE WAR THAN IT WAS BEFORE THE WAR?  1. ALMOST NONE OF THEM 2. ABOUT ONE-FOURTH OF THEM 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM 4. ABOUT THREE-FOURTHS OF THEM 5. ALMOST ALL OF THEM 6. HAVEN'T ANY IDEA 0. NO ANSWER X. DATA FOR THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS NOT PROVIDED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION.

S086.Q70. HOW MANY YEARS WAS IT BETWEEN THE TIME YOU LEFT FULL-TIME SCHOOL AND THE TIME YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY?  1. I CAME INTO THE ARMY RIGHT OUT OF SCHOOL 2. 1 YEAR OR LESS 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 4. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 5 YEARS 5. OVER 5 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER
S086.Q71. IF YOU HAVE EVER ATTENDED COLLEGE WHAT COURSE OF STUDY DID YOU MAJOR IN?  1. I NEVER WENT TO COLLEGE 2. SOME COURSE OF STUDY WRITTEN IN 0. NO ANSWER
S086.Q72. IF YOU COULD DO WHAT YOU WANTED, WOULD YOU LIKE TO GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE AFTER THE WAR?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S086.Q73. REGARDLESS OF WHAT YOU WANT TO DO, DO YOU THINK YOU WILL ACTUALLY GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE AFTER THE WAR?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q74. DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE AFTER THE WAR IF THE FEDERAL GOVERNMENT OR YOUR STATE GOVERNMENT WERE WILLING TO HELP PAY YOUR WAY?  1. I EXPECT TO GO BACK TO SCHOOL WHETHER OR NOT THE FEDERAL OR STATE GOVERNMENT HELPS ME 2. I WILL GO BACK IF THE FEDERAL OR STATE GOVERNMENT HELPS ME 3. I WILL NOT GO BACK, EVEN IF THE FEDERAL OR STATE GOVERNMENT WOULD HELP ME 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q75. HOW MUCH HELP WOULD YOU HAVE TO HAVE IN ORDER TO GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE AFTER THE WAR IF THE FEDERAL OR STATE GOVERNMENT WERE WILLING TO HELP PAY YOUR WAY?  1. NONE 2. TUITION AND BOOKS ONLY 3. TUITION, BOOKS AND $25.00 A MONTH 4. TUITION, BOOKS AND $50,000 A MONTH 5. TUITION, BOOKS AND $75.00 A MONTH 6. TUITION, BOOKS AND SOME OTHER AMOUNT A MONTH 7. I DON'T THINK I WILL GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q76. IF YOU WERE OFFERED A GOOD JOB AT THE END OF THE WAR, DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD TURN IT DOWN AND GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE, OR DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD TAKE THE JOB?  1. I WOULD TURN THE JOB DOWN AND GO BACK TO SCHOOL 2. IF I COULD GET SOME HELP, I WOULD TURN THE JOB DOWN AND GO BACK TO SCHOOL 3. I WOULD TAKE THE JOB AND NOT GO BACK TO SCHOOL 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q77. IF YOU COULD GET SOME KIND OF JOB AFTER THE WAR, BUT COULD NOT GET A GOOD JOB, DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD TURN IT DOWN AND GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE, OR DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD TAKE THE JOB?  1. I WOULD TURN THE JOB DOWN AND GO BACK TO SCHOOL 2. IF I COULD GET SOME HELP, I WOULD TURN THE JOB DOWN AND GO BACK TO SCHOOL 3. I WOULD TAKE THE JOB AND NOT GO BACK TO SCHOOL 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q78. IF THE WAR LASTS LONGER THAN YOU EXPECT, WILL THAT MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE IN WHETHER YOU GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE AFTER THE WAR?  1. I DON'T THINK I WILL GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE 2. I WILL GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE, EVEN IF THE WAR LASTS LONGER THAN I EXPECT 3. I WILL PROBABLY NOT GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE IF THE WAR LASTS LONGER THAN I EXPECT 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q79. REGARDLESS OF WHAT YOU WANT TO DO, DO YOU THINK YOU WILL ACTUALLY GO TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE, OR GO TO PART- TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE AFTER THE WAR?  1. I DON'T THINK I WILL GO TO SCHOOL OR COLLEGE AT ALL AFTER THE WAR 2. I THINK I WILL GO TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL 3. I THINK I WILL GO TO PART-TIME SCHOOL 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q80A. IF YOU GO TO FULL-TIME OR PART-TIME SCHOOL AFTER THE WAR, WHAT KIND OF SCHOOL WILL YOU GO TO?  1. I WILL NOT GO TO SCHOOL AFTER THE WAR 2. GRADE SCHOOL 3. TRADE SCHOOL 4. BUSINESS SCHOOL 5. HIGH SCHOOL 6. COLLEGE (UNDERGRADUATE) 7. SOME OTHER KIND OF SCHOOL 8. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 80B NOT CODED.
S086.CARD.  2. CARD TWO
S086.DECK.  086. SURVEY NUMBER
S086.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.

S086.Q81. AFTER THE WAR, DO YOU THINK THE UNITED STATES COULD HAVE AN ARMY LARGE ENOUGH FOR THE COUNTRY'S NEEDS BY TAKING VOLUNTEERS ONLY?  1. YES, I THINK IT COULD 2. NO, I DO NOT THINK IT COULD 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q82. AFTER THE WAR, DO YOU THINK THE UNITED STATES SHOULD DRAFT ALL YOUNG MEN FOR A CERTAIN AMOUNT OF ARMY TRAINING DURING PEACETIME OR SHOULD WE GO BACK TO THE REGULAR ARMY SYSTEM OF TAKING VOLUNTEERS ONLY?  1. DRAFT ALL YOUNG MEN FOR A CERTAIN AMOUNT OF TRAINING 2. GO BACK TO TAKING VOLUNTEERS ONLY 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S086.Q83. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING REASONS COMES CLOSEST TO SAYING WHY YOU THINK THE UNITED STATES SHOULD DRAFT ALL YOUNG MEN FOR A CERTAIN AMOUNT OF ARMY TRAINING DURING PEACETIME?  1. I THINK THE UNITED STATES SHOULD GO BACK TO TAKING VOLUNTEERS ONLY 2. BECAUSE I THINK THE ARMY EXPERIENCE IS WORTHWHILE FOR YOUNG MEN 3. BECAUSE I THINK IT IS NECESSARY FOR THE SAFETY OF THE UNITED STATES 4. BECAUSE I THINK IT IS BOTH WORTHWHILE FOR YOUNG MEN AND NECESSARY FOR THE SAFETY OF THE UNITED STATES 5. FOR SOME OTHER REASON 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q84. IF ALL YOUNG MEN IN THE UNITED STATES WERE TO BE GIVEN MILITARY TRAINING, AT ABOUT WHAT AGE DO YOU THINK THIS TRAINING SHOULD BEGIN?  1. BEFORE 18 YEARS OF AGE 2. AT 18 YEARS OF AGE 3. AT 19 YEARS OF AGE 4. AT 20 YEARS OF AGE 5. AT 21 YEARS OF AGE 6. AFTER 21 YEARS OF AGE 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q85. IF ALL YOUNG MEN IN THE UNITED STATES WERE TO BE GIVEN MILITARY TRAINING, FOR ABOUT HOW LONG A TIME DO YOU THINK EACH MAN SHOULD GET TRAINING?  1. ABOUT 6 MONTHS 2. ABOUT 1 YEAR 3. ABOUT 1 1/2 YEARS 4. ABOUT 2 YEARS 5. MORE THAN 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q86A. DID YOU SEE "PRELUDE TO WAR"* (THIS SHOWS HOW JAPAN, ITALY AND GERMANY PREPARED FOR WAR. IT COMPARES THE FREE WORLD AND THE SLAVE WORLD. IT BEGINS WITH THE JAP ATTACK ON CHINA AND ENDS WITH ITALY'S ATTACK ON ETHIOPIA.)  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER
S086.Q86B. DID YOU SEE "THE NAZIS STRIKE"* (THIS SHOWS HOW GERMANY TOOK OVER AUSTRIA AND CZECHOSLOVAKIA AND THEN INVADED POLAND.)  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER
S086.Q86C. DID YOU SEE "DIVIDE AND CONQUER"* (THIS SHOWS THE GERMAN INVASION OF NORWAY, THE LOW COUNTRIES, AND THE DEFEAT OF FRANCE.)  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER
S086.Q86D. DID YOU SEE "THE BATTLE OF BRITAIN"* (THIS SHOWS THE GERMAN AIR BOMBINGS OF ENGLAND RIGHT AFTER THE DEFEAT OF FRANCE.)  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER E. TOTAL NUMBER OF ORIENTATION FILMS SEEN:

S086.Q86D. DID YOU SEE "THE BATTLE OF BRITAIN"* (THIS SHOWS THE GERMAN AIR BOMBINGS OF ENGLAND RIGHT AFTER THE DEFEAT OF FRANCE.)  64 1. NONE 112 2. ONE 165 3. TWO 195 4. THREE 513 5. FOUR 10 0. NO ANSWER TO ENTIRE QUESTION

S086.Q87. WHAT DID YOU THINK OF THE "WHY WE FIGHT" FILMS YOU SAW?  1. THEY GAVE ME A MUCH BETTER UNDERSTANDING OF WHAT WE ARE FIGHTING FOR 2. THEY GAVE ME A SOMEWHAT BETTER UNDERSTANDING OF WHAT WE ARE FIGHTING FOR 3. THEY WERE A WASTE OF TIME AS FAR AS I WAS CONCERNED 4. I HAVEN'T SEEN ANY OF THE "WHY WE FIGHT" FILMS 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q88. ABOUT HOW OFTEN DO YOU THINK FILMS ON WHAT WE ARE FIGHTING FOR SHOULD BE SHOWN TO THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT DURING DUTY HOURS?  1. TWO OR MORE TIMES A WEEK 2. ABOUT ONCE A WEEK 3. TWO OR THREE TIMES A MONTH 4. ABOUT ONCE A MONTH 5. LESS THAN ONCE A MONTH 6. NO SUCH FILMS SHOULD BE SHOWN TO THE MEN DURING DUTY HOURS 0. NO ANSWER

S086.Q89. IN YOUR FRANK OPINION, HOW GOOD A JOB DO YOU THINK SUCH FILMS DO OF GIVING TROOPS A FULL UNDERSTANDING OF WHAT WE ARE FIGHTING FOR IN THIS WAR?  1.
